Simon

Front End software developer

Hello there! My name is Badare Basem Simon, a self-taught software developer with logic driven dynamic solution for front end development. My core skill is based on Python and JavaScript. I am so passionate about React.I can provide clean code and pixel perfect design. I also make website more & more interactive with web animations.
